thread.title: Cryptoverse: Next wave of US crypto ETFs already in the pipeline
thread.title_full: Cryptoverse: Next wave of US crypto ETFs already in the pipeline

author: Suzanne McGee
title: Cryptoverse: Next wave of US crypto ETFs already in the pipeline
text:
That first wave of bitcoin ETFs attracted a whopping $65 billion in 2024, helping to propel the price of bitcoin from $43,000 to more than $100,000. The... By Suzanne McGee
(Reuters) - What a difference a year makes.
Rewind the clock to early January 2024, and the asset-management industry was anxiously watching to see if the much-anticipated debut of U.S. spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds could live up to expectations they would pull in as much as $30 billion in their first year.
Today, those issuers are cracking open the champagne.
largest of those new products, BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust, has become the most successful debut in the ETF industry's 35-year history.
But that's just the start of the party, cryptocurrency denizens believe.
Shortly after those products celebrate their first anniversary on Jan. 10, President-elect Donald Trump - who has pledged to be a crypto president - will be sworn in for the second time, igniting what cryptocurrency fans believe will be a new golden era for the digitalâ€¦
Suzanne McGee
